column4: whats the cmd to upgrade pidgin isnt it sudo apt-get upgrade pidgin     please correct me if im wrong
also they are working getting the fix for this out as soon as possible. currently the upgrade isn't available.. you can install the fix from a deb if you want it
if switching your paging server doesn't work you could install with the .deb  :: http://news.softpedia.com/news/How-to-Fix-Yahoo-problem-in-Pidgin-114754.shtml
